name: GNAM ALPHA
description:
We are a group of Italian friends passionate about videogames who decided to have a try with VR development. We hope this game can offer you some good time and we appreciate if you decide to support us.

How to play

Stand up, grab your gear and enter the land of Gnam, where everything is gnammy, and have fun while eating all you can eat!

You can play it with your friends or family and as many times as you want.

  • Eat as fast as you can to gain points in a limited time
  • Complete levels and objectives to collect useful items. You can loot them from the skewer below the table
  • Once you drop an item it will explode in few seconds, store them in the inventory and use them when the game become rough
  • Weapons can be held in a special place, when you grab a gun look at your hips and you will find a holster
  • Avoid poisoned food, they can slow you
  • The gummy bears will try to cause you difficulties, stun or shoot them to get extra time and bonus items

Disclaimer

Gnam is an Arcade game in ALPHA stage, this means that is not a complete game and it's still under development. Feel free to test it and please leave us a comment.

If you want to get more info during the development or want to report bugs, feel free to leave a comment.

Gnam is tested only for Oculus Quest 2 and should be fully compatible with Oculus Rift S. We're going to include other devices in the next releases.

Soundtrack: Funiculì funiculà by Liberato

Next steps

Our plan is to polish the game, add new minigames besides multiplayer support but first, we'd love to hear some feedback from you :)
